Feats-Skill-Society -- Female Versatile Human Bard: 3
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +1 Constitution: +1 Intelligence: +3 Wisdom: +0 Charisma: +2
Background: Raised By Belief Deity: Nethys
Experience: 2060/3000 Level: 3 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 7/12
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Belief Attributes: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 2; General: 2; Skill: 1 Selectable Feature Count: Bard (Muse); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Biographical Eye; Courtly Graces; Eye For Numbers; Glean Contents; Legendary Codebreaker; Legendary Linguist; Leverage Connections; Multifarious Muse (Maestro); Multilingual; Reach Spell; Read Lips; Sign Language; Streetwise; Unconventional Weaponry (Maul); Underground Network Bard Features: Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attribute Boost (Charisma); Attribute Boosts; Bard Feats; Bard Skills; Bard Spellcasting; Class Trained (Bard); Composition Spells; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); General Feats; Muse; Perception Expert; Polymath; Reflex Expertise; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Signature Spells; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spell Trained (Occult) Raised By Belief Features: Belief Attributes; Belief Skills Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage; Versatile Human
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Bard Feats: 1 selections
Belief Skills: Has the Assurance (Arcana) feature
General Feats: 1 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Multifarious Muse (Maestro): +1 Class Feat
Muse: 1 selection
Polymath: Has the Versatile Performance feature
Skill Feats: 1 selections
Versatile Human: +1 General Feat
Multifarious Muse (Maestro): Can select maestro muse feats
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; untrained) Library Lore: +8 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +8 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +8 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +0 (wisdom; untrained) Society: +10 (intelligence; expert)
Athletics: +2 (strength; untrained) Milling Lore: +8 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Nature: +0 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +0 (wisdom; untrained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Occultism: +8 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Outer Rifts Lore: +8 (intelligence; trained) Underworld Lore: +8 (intelligence; trained)
Guild Lore: +8 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +7 (charisma; trained)
Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +0 (wisdom; untrained)
Languages: Common; Fey; Gnomish; Halfling; Orcish; Shadowtongue; Thalassic
Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 7 from any)
Belief Skills: Skill Trained (Arcana; Nethys Lore)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Multilingual: +2 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Assurance (Arcana): Can take an automatic 15 on Arcana checks
Biographical Eye: 1 min with a target and a successful DC 30 Society check reveals its profession, specialty, and where it lives, critical success adds its homeland and a major accomplishment or controversy, failure reveals only its homeland and profession, and critical failure gives incorrect info
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Eye For Numbers: Can accurately estimate the number of items in a group with a glance and can do so with a foe's possessions to gain a +1 Society check to Create A Diversion or Feint
Glean Contents: Can use a Society check with a +1 bonus to Decipher Writing on a partially-glimpsed message or sealed letter
Legendary Codebreaker: Can use Society to Decipher Writing at full Speed, and successes at normal Speed are critical successes
Legendary Linguist: Can establish basic communication with any creature that uses language
Leverage Connections: Can use Society to gain a meeting with an important figure or to exchange favors
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and may inflict fascinated and off-guard
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Underground Network: 1 hr spent with local contacts gives a +1 Recall Knowledge to Gather Information, or +2 if using Underworld Lore
Versatile Performance: Can use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation to Impersonate, Make An Impression, Demoralize, or to satisfy prerequisites
Combat
Hit Points: 35 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Bard: 17 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Composite Shortbow (+6 1d6+1 P [Crit +d10] R60'; dexterity; trained); Greatclub (+7 1d10+2 B; strength; trained); Greatpick (+7 1d10+2 P [Crit d12]; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Maul): Weapon Familiarity (Maul)
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +7 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 17 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Phantasmal Minion (O1): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool
Polymath: Knows the Phantasmal Minion occult spell
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Notes
Validation Errors:
Biographical Eye Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and society rank (currently 2) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 3 available vs. 12 allocated
Legendary Codebreaker Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and society rank (currently 2) >= 4
Legendary Linguist Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15, society rank (currently 2) >= 4 and multilingual feature (currently 1)
